name: Astropatrolonium
description:
the mission: destroy mega asteroids.

up to five spacemen can  play with gamepads or gather around one keyboard.

Play cooperative or enable the "deadly bullets" option and shot each other.

2 game modes:

1) Levels: increasingly difficult levels, limited respawns.

2) Master Blaster: First player to reach 1000 points wins. Unlimited respawns but you lose points.

featuring music by:

-tfg (Astropatrolonium main theme)

- https://soundcloud.com/spirulence

trouble-shooting:

In one reported case, a blank screen on Win 10 was solved by updating the AMD Adrenalin drivers to version 22.8.1
